starTrekMod:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
starTrekMod:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

starTrekMod:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
starTrekMod:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
starTrekMod:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

starTrekMod:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
starTrekMod:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

starTrekMod:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
starTrekMod:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage [E] times. NL (Deal !starTrekMod:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

starTrekMod:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkil.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
starTrekMod:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkil.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and !starTrekMod:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.
